servinfo.title: Sub Fuel Level Sensor Removal and Installation

item.ptxt: Do not touch resister plate (1) and deform arm (2). It may cause sub fuel level sensor to fail.

s1.ptxt: Remove fuel tank from vehicle Referring to Fuel Tank Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A .
Disconnect sub fuel level sensor connector (1).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Fuel Level Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Replace O-ring with new one using care not to damage it.
Apply thin coat of fuel to O-ring, and then install sub fuel level sensor.
